technologies.name: Jekyll
technologies.description: Jekyll is a blog-aware, static site generator for personal, project, or organisation sites.

technologies.name: Apple iCloud Mail
technologies.description: Apple iCloud Mail is a webmail service provided by Apple, Inc.

technologies.name: Ruby
technologies.description: Ruby is an open-source object-oriented programming language.

technologies.name: Varnish
technologies.description: Varnish is a reverse caching proxy.

technologies.name: GitHub Pages
technologies.description: GitHub Pages is a static site hosting service.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Cloudflare Rocket Loader
technologies.description: Cloudflare Rocket Loader is responsible for prioritising over website's content by delaying the loading of Javascript until rendering.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Fastly
technologies.description: Fastly is a cloud computing services provider. Fastly's cloud platform provides a content delivery network, Internet security services, load balancing, and video & streaming services.

technologies.name: Cloudflare
technologies.description: Cloudflare is a web-infrastructure and website-security company, providing content-delivery-network services, DDoS mitigation, Internet security, and distributed domain-name-server services.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: HTTP/3
technologies.description: HTTP/3 is the third major version of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol used to exchange information on the World Wide Web.
